scripts.drop_dishes: psql -U raphael -h localhost kitchendb -c 'TRUNCATE dish CASCADE;'
scripts.drop_ingredients: psql -U raphael -h localhost kitchendb -c 'TRUNCATE ingredient CASCADE;'
scripts.drop_menus: psql -U raphael -h localhost kitchendb -c 'TRUNCATE menu CASCADE;'
scripts.drop_food: npm run drop_dishes && npm run drop_ingredients && npm run drop_menus
